summary: I BOUGHT THE CAR AS NEW WITH 6711 MILES.  AROUND 12000 MILES THE VEHICLE WOULDN'T   START.  ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE HAD TO REPLACE THE BATTERY ON 3 DIFFERENT OCCASIONS FROM 6-28-17 TO 8-19-17.  THE BATTERY WAS COMPLETELY DOWN,NO CELLS, CAN'T BE CHARGED.  THE CAR WAS PARKED EACH TIME.  DEALER AND GM COULDN'T FIND THE PROBLEM.  NO FEEDBACK FROM THEM.  DEALER KEPT THE CAR FROM 8-19-17 UNTIL 11-1-17.  STILL NO VALID EXPLANATION THE PROBLEM.  THEY SAID THEY CAN'T DUPLICATE IT.
